languages.text: Эти устрашающие орудия отлиты на великом мире Кьява Гамма. Канониры шепчутся, что по ночам на артиллерийской палубе слышен замогильный хохот и пропадают люди. При выстреле же они издают вой столь ужасающий, словно в жерлах их сидят души грешников. Но правда куда страшнее...

These fearsome weapons were cast on the great world of Kiava Gamma. Gunners whisper about having heard otherworldly cackling on the artillery deck at night and claim that people go missing there. When these weapons are fired, they let out a terrifying howl, as if their muzzles house the souls of malefactors. The truth, however, is far more frightening...
languages.original_text: Эти устрашающие орудия отлиты на великом мире Кьява Гамма. Канониры шепчутся, что по ночам на артиллерийской палубе слышен замогильный хохот и пропадают люди. При выстреле же они издают вой столь ужасающий, словно в жерлах их сидят души грешников. Но правда куда страшнее...

traits.locale_text: These fearsome weapons were cast on the great world of Kiava Gamma. Gunners whisper about having heard otherworldly cackling on the artillery deck at night and claim that people go missing there. When these weapons are fired, they let out a terrifying howl, as if their muzzles house souls of sinners. The truth, however, is far more frightening...

When these weapons are fired, they let out a terrifying howl, as if their muzzles house souls of sinners. The truth, however, is far more frightening...

When these weapons are fired, they let out a terrifying howl, as if their muzzles house the souls of sinners. The truth, however, is far more frightening...

These fearsome weapons were cast on the great world of Kiava Gamma. Gunners whisper about having heard otherworldly cackling on the artillery deck at night and claim that people go missing there. When these weapons are fired, they let out a terrifying howl, as if their muzzles house the souls of malefactors. The truth, however, is far more frightening...

languages.text: Estas formidables armas fueron forjadas en el grandioso mundo de Kiava Gamma. Los artilleros susurran, afirmando que han oído risas dementes en la cubierta de artillería por la noche y que la gente suele desaparecer. Cuando estos cañones disparan, emiten un aullido como si en su boca encerraran el alma de un malhechor. Sin embargo, la verdad es mucho más aterradora...
languages.original_text: These fearsome weapons were cast on the great world of Kiava Gamma. Gunners whisper about having heard otherworldly cackling on the artillery deck at night and claim that people go missing there. When these weapons are fired, they let out a terrifying howl, as if their muzzles house the souls of malefactors. The truth, however, is far more frightening...

traits.locale_text: Estas formidables armas fueron forjadas en el grandioso mundo de Kiava Gamma. Los artilleros susurran, afirmando que han oído risas dementes en la cubierta de artillería por la noche y que la gente suele desaparecer. Cuando estos cañones disparan, emiten un aullido como si en su boca encerraran el alma de un malhechor. Sin embargo, la verdad es mucho más aterradora...

languages.text: Ces armes effrayantes ont été fondues sur le vaste monde de Kiava Gamma. Parmi les canonniers, il se murmure que l'on peut entendre des ricanements surnaturels sur le pont d'artillerie, à la nuit tombée, et que des gens s'y sont volatilisés. Lorsqu'ils font feu, ces canons émettent un hurlement terrifiant, comme s'ils renfermaient une légion d'âmes damnées. La vérité, toutefois, est autrement plus glaçante...
languages.original_text: These fearsome weapons were cast on the great world of Kiava Gamma. Gunners whisper about having heard otherworldly cackling on the artillery deck at night and claim that people go missing there. When these weapons are fired, they let out a terrifying howl, as if their muzzles house the souls of malefactors. The truth, however, is far more frightening...

traits.locale_text: Ces armes effrayantes ont été fondues sur le vaste monde de Kiava Gamma. Parmi les canonniers, il se murmure que l'on peut entendre des ricanements surnaturels sur le pont d'artillerie, à la nuit tombée, et que des gens s'y sont volatilisés. Lorsqu'ils font feu, ces canons émettent un hurlement terrifiant, comme s'ils renfermaient une légion d'âmes damnées. La vérité, toutefois, est autrement plus glaçante...

languages.text: 这种可怕的武器是在基亚瓦伽马星的广袤大地上建造起来的。炮手间传言，每当入夜，火炮甲板上就会传来来自另一个世界的恐怖声音，还会有人失踪。开炮时，这种宏炮会发出令人毛骨悚然的咆哮，仿佛炮管中潜藏着无数罪孽的灵魂。然而，真相却远远比这更加恐怖……
languages.original_text: These fearsome weapons were cast on the great world of Kiava Gamma. Gunners whisper about having heard otherworldly cackling on the artillery deck at night and claim that people go missing there. When these weapons are fired, they let out a terrifying howl, as if their muzzles house the souls of malefactors. The truth, however, is far more frightening...

traits.locale_text: 这种可怕的武器是在基亚瓦伽马星的广袤大地上建造起来的。炮手间传言，每当入夜，火炮甲板上就会传来来自另一个世界的恐怖声音，还会有人失踪。开炮时，这种宏炮会发出令人毛骨悚然的咆哮，仿佛炮管中潜藏着无数罪孽的灵魂。然而，真相却远远比这更加恐怖……

languages.text: これらの恐るべき兵器は、キアヴァ・ガンマという大きな惑星で鋳造されたものだ。砲手たちは夜、砲撃甲板でこの世のものとは思えぬようなささやきを聞いたと言っており、そこで行方不明になった者もいると言う。これらの兵器が発射されると、まるで銃口に犯罪者の魂が宿っているかのような恐ろしい遠吠えを発する。しかし、その真実はさらに恐ろしいものなのだ…
languages.original_text: These fearsome weapons were cast on the great world of Kiava Gamma. Gunners whisper about having heard otherworldly cackling on the artillery deck at night and claim that people go missing there. When these weapons are fired, they let out a terrifying howl, as if their muzzles house the souls of malefactors. The truth, however, is far more frightening...

traits.locale_text: これらの恐るべき兵器は、キアヴァ・ガンマという大きな惑星で鋳造されたものだ。砲手たちは夜、砲撃甲板でこの世のものとは思えぬようなささやきを聞いたと言っており、そこで行方不明になった者もいると言う。これらの兵器が発射されると、まるで銃口に犯罪者の魂が宿っているかのような恐ろしい遠吠えを発する。しかし、その真実はさらに恐ろしいものなのだ…

languages.text: Diese furchterregenden Waffen wurden auf der großen Welt Kiava Gamma gefertigt. Schützen berichten flüsternd davon, dass sie nachts auf dem Artilleriedeck ein unheimliches Kichern gehört haben und dass dort Leute verschwinden. Wenn diese Waffen abgefeuert werden, stoßen sie ein furchterregendes Heulen aus, als würden in ihrem Lauf böse Seelen hausen. Die Wahrheit ist jedoch noch viel furchterregender ...
languages.original_text: These fearsome weapons were cast on the great world of Kiava Gamma. Gunners whisper about having heard otherworldly cackling on the artillery deck at night and claim that people go missing there. When these weapons are fired, they let out a terrifying howl, as if their muzzles house the souls of malefactors. The truth, however, is far more frightening...

languages.text: Bu dehşet veren silahlar, koca Kiava Gama dünyasında dövülmüştür. Topçular, gece vakti ağır silah güvertesinde uhrevi kıkırdamalar duyduklarını fısıldaşır ve insanların orada kaybolduğunu iddia ederler. Silahlar ateşlendiğinde sanki namluları habis ruhlar barındırıyormuş gibi, kan donduran bir uğultu çıkarırlar... Ancak gerçek çok daha ürkütücüdür.
